comment: This is pretty good. It needs Google Fit integration for the step count

reply.content: Thanks for your review, we take notefor the next update of our watchfaces, do you have seen the other watchfaces?

title: Needs worrk

author: Lucas Phillips
comment: I don't know how to work it

reply.author: SamSoft
reply.content:
-Check that the phone is connected to the smartwatch
-Install it
-Wait two minutes until a notification appears with the installation on your smartwatch
-If it not appears then you must open Android Wear and run resync apps
-If the notification appears, you must press on it or long press on the screen for you take the watch faces list for select it
